src:
Rayakan Hari Oeang, Sri Mulyani Berdendang Cucak Rawa
02 Nov 2019, 04:25 by Caesar Akbar, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani ikut memeriahkan acara Family Gathering Hari Oeang ke-73. Ia menyumbang suara dengan mendendangkan dua buah tembang di atas panggung.
"Lagu Bengawan Solo," ujar Sri Mulyani kepada band pengiring di atas panggung acara di Lapangan Kompleks Kementerian Keuangan, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Saat musik pengiring dibunyikan, Sri Mulyani pun menyanyikan lagu yang dipopulerkan maestro keroncong Gesang itu bersama seorang penyanyi Endah Laras. Panggung juga diramaikan oleh sejumlah pejabat Kementerian Keuangan, misalnya Wakil Menteri Keuangan Suahasil Nazara, Direktur Jenderal Anggaran Askolani, hingga Direktur Jenderal Bea Cukai Heru Pambudi.
Para pejabat Kementerian Keuangan itu mengenakan setelan kaus seragam berwarna biru dengan kerah kuning dan celana olah raga atau celana jeans. Adapun Sri Mulyani melengkapi penampilannya dengan kaca mata hitam dan rambut diikat ke belakang.
12 Selanjutnya
text:
Celebrate Oeang Day, Sri Mulyani Chants Cucak Rawa
02 Nov 2019, 04:25 by Caesar Akbar, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Finance Minister Sri Mulyani participated in the 73rd Family Gathering Day event. He contributed the sound by singing two songs on the stage.
"The Bengawan Solo song," Sri Mulyani said to the accompanying band on the stage of the event at the Ministry of Finance Complex Field, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
When the accompanying music was played, Sri Mulyani also sang the song that was popularized by the kerangong Gesang maestro with a singer Endah Laras. The stage was also enlivened by a number of Ministry of Finance officials, for example Deputy Minister of Finance Suahasil Nazara, Director General of Askolani's Budget, to Director General of Customs and Excise Heru Pambudi.
The Ministry of Finance officials wore blue uniform shirts with yellow collars and sports pants or jeans. The Sri Mulyani completes her appearance with sunglasses and her hair tied back.
